\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	X \& {\frac{X}{L \cap \ker p}} \&\& {\frac{X}{\ker p}} \& C \\
	\& {\frac{X}{L}} \&\& {\frac{X}{L + \ker p}}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["p", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-5, to=1-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
